Title: Relates to mandating greater levels of disclosure by non-fiduciaries that provide investment advice
Summary: Relates to mandating greater levels of disclosure by non-fiduciaries that provide investment advice; requires signed acknowledgement of disclosure informing clients that the advisor owes no fiduciary duty.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to mandating greater levels of disclosure by non-fiduciaries that provide investment advice
